column2:
def prettyPrint(matrix):
    numRows=len(matrix)
    numCols=len(matrix[0]) 
    possible_states=["S","H","N"]
    print ("       1       2       3       4       5       6       7       9")
    for row in range (numRows):
        print (possible_states[row], end="   ")
        for col in range(numCols): 
            print(format(matrix[row][col], "5.4f"), end="  ")
        print("")

    print("")
